1. Mayor

Mayor
=====

The mayor is responsible for overseeing departments and executing policies, including:

* Assuring that all city services are delivered to the citizens of Crandall in an effective, efficient, and equitable manner and in compliance with City Council policy
* Serving as the primary outreach arm of the city government to other cities and other government entities

![DL](https://www.crandalltexas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=690 "DL")
